alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kankakee; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:11PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Will, southern Grundy and west central Kankakee Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 411 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mazon, or 8 miles southwest of Coal City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Braidwood, Wilmington, Coal City, Diamond, Gardner, Lakewood Shores, Mazon, Braceville, Essex, South Wilmington, Godley, Bonfield, Carbon Hill, Verona and East Brooklyn. Including the following interstate... I-55 between mile markers 221 and 243. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
